mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project WHERE 1=1 AND projectNo >0 AND projectDeleted = 0 ORDER BY projectNo DESC
SELECT projectNo FROM project WHERE 1=1 AND projectName=#{projectName}

SELECT p.projectNo , p.projectName , p.projectStartDate , p.projectEndDate , p.projectCompanyName , p.projectContent , e.empName FROM project p INNER JOIN TEAM t ON p.PROJECTNO = t.PROJECTNO INNER JOIN EMPINFO ei ON t.TEAMNO = ei.TEAMNO INNER JOIN EMP e ON ei.EMPID = e.EMPID WHERE 1=1 AND p.PROJECTNO = #{projectNo} AND p.PROJECTDELETED = 0 AND e.ROLE = 'ROLE_PM'
